pr_title: [hue] Catch exception if 'AllGroup' does not exist

timeline.message:
Catch exception of 'AllGroup' does not exist

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>

timeline.bodyText:
Was it there really for no valid reason ?
This is requiring a good analysis.
timeline.author: lolodomo

replies.bodyText: The deep analysis will reveal that this method (getAllGroup()) never has been used before.
replies.author: cweitkamp
